snippet: The ShowRoom Cinema in Asbury Park, which recently opened a larger space, is drawing film lovers who want something other than big commercial pictures and popcorn.
abstract: ShowRoom Cinema in Asbury Park, which has expanded since opening in 2009, is drawing film lovers who want something other than blockbuster commercial movies and popcorn; owners Michael Sodano and Nancy Sabino see their efforts as part of city's attempts to build art-focused, vibrant community (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The ShowRoom Cinema in Asbury Park, which recently opened a larger space, is drawing film lovers who want something other than big commercial pictures and popcorn.

headline.seo: ShowRoom Cinema in Asbury Park Brings an Atypical Viewing Experience
headline.main: Cinematic Polish for an Evolving Shore Town
headline.print_headline: Cinematic Polish for an Evolving Shore Town
